src:
Sloboda kao prokleta protiv Zlatibora, Popovićev tripl-dabl vodio Čajetince do pobede
Napredak iz Aleksinca nastavlja da ređa iznenađenja, pao Dinamik

02 Nov 2019

Nastavak ludog programa u Košarkaškoj ligi Srbije imali smo priliku da gledamo na Zlatiboru. U meču punom uspona i padova, u kojem su ekipe brzo išle od vrha do dna, na kraju se bolje snašao domaći tim. Sloboda je tako produžila užasan niz koji ima protiv ove ekipe u poslednjih nekoliko godina - 94:85.
Čini se da je Zlatibor odlučujuću prednost napravio sredinom poslednje deonice, kada je otišao na pet poena prednosti. Sloboda je pokušavala da ga uhvati, ali su domaći iznova uzvraćali. Na kraju, devet poena prednosti možda deluje i previše, s obzirom na to da su Užičani ipak bili u igri sve do pred sam kraj.
Najupečatljiviji statistički podatak je taj da je Svetozar Popović danas upisao tripl-dabl učinak. Košarkaš Zlatibora učinio je nešto što se zaista retko dešava na parketima u Srbiji, postigavši 15 poena, upisavši 10 skokova i zabeleživši čak 16 asistencija.
Mnogo bolje je u meč ušla ekipa Slobode. Užičani su uz pomoć Dimitrija Nikolića i Dušana Kutlešića ređali koš za košem i brzo su otišli na sasvim solidnu rezultatsku distancu. Zapravo, na kraju prvog kvartala imali su tačno 10 poena prednosti - 13:23.
Tu prednost uspevali su da održe i na startu druge četvrtine, a onda je usledio pad i to kakav. Potpuno neobjašnjiv. Zlatibor je krenuo da rešeta Užičane sa svih pozicija, ušao je u neverovatnu seriju od 29:6, pa je na poluvremenu vodio sa čak 12 poena - 49:37.



Međutim, Sloboda se osvestila kada je meč „restartovan“. Mic po mic, Ere su već nakon par minuta bile na tri poena zaostatka, a kako se deonica primicala kraju prilazili su sve bliže. Tako smo došli u situaciju da pred poslednjih deset minuta Rosoneri čak i povedu - 64:65.
No, Zlatibor je otvorio poslednju deonicu serijom 7:2, preuzeo prednost i uspeo je da je održi sve do pred sam kraj. Konstantno je Sloboda bila tu negde, na dva ili tri poena zaostatka, ali jednostavno nije umela da veže nekoliko dobrih odbrana, kako bi došla do izjednačenja. Čajetinci su to iskoristili, napravili seriju od 5:0, otišli na plus devet i tako stavili tačku na utakmicu - 94:85.
Što se drugih utakmica tiče, Metalac u Vršcu jeste izgubio, ali igra protiv jednog od trenutno najboljih timova lige može da ih motiviše da u nastavku sezone krenu ka sredini tabele. Valjevci su u utakmici bili sve do pred poslednjih deset minuta kada je na delo ipak stupilo iskustvo i uigranost Vršca, koji je slavio - 79:71.
Najefikasniji kod domaćih bio je Garbijel Biler sa 19 poena, dok se Aleksa Stepanović sa 20 poena istakao kod Valjevaca.
Napredak iz Aleksinca pokazuje da više nije samo prijatno iznenađenje, već pravi hit domaćeg šampionata i čini se da će se ova ekipa možda umešati i u borbu za ABA 2 ligu. Danas je na domaćem terenu poražen Dinamik, koji se upravo ove godine i takmiči u drugom rangu na Jadranu - 71:62.



Činilo se da su se Doćolci od pobede oprostili već nakon osam minuta igre. Serijom 14:0, Aleksinčani su otišli na 15 poena prednosti. No, Dimanik je donekle uzvratio do poluvremena i pokušao je da utakmicu učini nešto uzbudljivijom.
Sve je ipak rešeno u poslednjem kvartalu, kada je Napredak otišao na čak 17 razlike. Jeste Dinamik do kraja nekako uspeo da smanji zaostatak, ali to je sve što je uostalom i uradio.
Na kraju, najzaslužniji za pobedu domaćih bio je Aleksandar Ilkić koji je meč završio sa 18 poena, dok su kod gostiju najbolji bili Miroslav Pašajlić i Gregor Glas sa po 11 poena.
Jako dramatično bilo je u Lazarevcu, gde je Kolubara uspela da upiše drugu prvenstvenu pobedu, pre svega staloženijom igrom u samoj završnici. Sve je završeno šutevima sa linije za slobodna bacanja, a Vojvodina je ponovo završila na strani poraženog i tako ostala da drži fenjer u Košarkaškoj ligi Srbije - 94:91.

KOŠARKAŠKA LIGA SRBIJE – 5. KOLO

PetakDunav – Mladost Zemun 89:95/Kovačević 20 - Bibins 21/
SubotaOKK Beograd - Novi Pazar 79:80/Musić N. 27 - Vulić 21/
Zlatibor - Sloboda 94:85/Papić 25, Popović 15 (10 sk, 16 as) - Tadić 21, Nikolić 19/
Napredak - Dinamik 71:62/Ilkić 18 - Pašajlić, Glas 11/
Vršac - Metalac 79:71/Biler 19 - Stepanović 20/
Kolubara - Vojvodina 94:91/Simić 24 - Simović 22/
Nedelja19.00: Borac – Tamiš




Piše: 
Srđan TODOROVIĆ

Foto: 
Star Sport
text:
Freedom as a Damn Against Zlatibor, Popovic's Triple-Double Leads Chajetinci to Win
Progress from Aleksinac continues to surpass surprises, dropped Dynamik

02 Nov 2019

Continuation of the crazy program in the Serbian Basketball League we had the opportunity to watch on Zlatibor. In a match full of ups and downs, in which teams quickly went from top to bottom, the home team got better. Freedom has thus extended the terrible streak it has against this team in recent years - 94:85.
Zlatibor seems to have made the decisive advantage in the middle of the last section, when it went to five points advantage. Freedom tried to capture him, but the locals retaliated. In the end, nine points of advantage may seem like too much, since the Wizards were still in the game until the very end.
The most striking statistic is that Svetozar Popovic registered a triple-double effect today. The Zlatibor basketball player did something that rarely happens on parquet floors in Serbia, scoring 15 points, registering 10 rebounds and recording as many as 16 assists.
Much better came the Freedom team. With the help of Dimitri Nikolic and Dusan Kutlesic, the Uzice men rode basket after basket and quickly went to a quite solid result distance. In fact, at the end of the first quarter they had exactly 10 points of advantage - 13:23.
They managed to maintain that advantage at the start of the second quarter, and then there was a fall and that. Totally inexplicable. Zlatibor started to rescue Uzice from all positions, entering an incredible 29-6 series, leading by 12 points at halftime - 49:37.



However, Freedom became aware when the match was "restarted". Mic by mic, the Ere were already three minutes behind by a few minutes, and as the section neared the end, they got closer and closer. So we got into the situation that the Rosoners even took the lead - 64:65 in the last ten minutes.
But Zlatibor opened the last section with a series of 7: 2, took the lead and managed to keep it until the very end. Freedom was constantly there, two or three points behind, but she just couldn't tie a few good defenses to make it even. The Chayatyns used that, made a series of 5-0, went to plus nine and thus put a point in the game - 94:85.
As for other games, Metalac in Vrsac did lose, but playing against one of the best teams in the league at the moment can motivate them to move towards the middle of the table in the continuation of the season. The Valjevo players were in the game until the last ten minutes, when the experience and skill of Vršac, who celebrated - 79:71, came into play.
Garbuel Biler scored 19 points for the home side, while Aleksa Stepanovic scored 20 points for Valjevo.
Progress from Aleksinac shows that it is no longer just a pleasant surprise, but a real hit of the domestic championship and it seems that this team may be involved in the fight for the ABA 2 league. Today Dynamic was defeated at home, and this year it is competing in the second rank in the Adriatic - 71:62.



The Dodgers seemed to have said goodbye after eight minutes of play. With the series 14-0, the Aleksinacs went on a 15-point advantage. But Dimanik got back to half time and tried to make the game a little more exciting.
However, everything was resolved in the last quarter, when Napredak went down by as much as 17 differences. Did Dynamic somehow manage to reduce the backlog, but that's all he did.
In the end, the most deserving of the home win was Aleksandar Ilkic who finished the match with 18 points, while the guests were Miroslav Pasajlic and Gregor Glas with 11 points.
It was very dramatic in Lazarevac, where Kolubara was able to record the second championship win, first and foremost by a more sophisticated game in the final. It all ended with shots from the free throw line, and Vojvodina again finished on the side of the loser and thus remained to hold the lantern in the Serbian Basketball League - 94:91.

SERBIA BASKETBALL LEAGUE - ROUND 5

FridayDunav - Mladost Zemun 89: 95 / Kovacevic 20 - Bibins 21 /
SaturdayOKK Belgrade - Novi Pazar 79: 80 / Music N. 27 - Vulic 21 /
Zlatibor - Sloboda 94: 85 / Papic 25, Popovic 15 (10 sk, 16 as) - Tadic 21, Nikolic 19 /
Progress - Dynamic 71: 62 / Ilkic 18 - Pasajlic, Voice 11 /
Vrsac - Metalac 79: 71 / Biller 19 - Stepanovic 20 /
Kolubara - Vojvodina 94: 91 / Simic 24 - Simovic 22 /
Sunday19.00: Fighter - Tamis




Writes:
Srđan TODOROVIĆ
